1.m: So God created man in his own image, in the image of God he created him; male and female he created them. - Genesis 1:27 (ESV)

l.q: What does Genesis 1 tell us about God?
l.a: Genesis 1 tells us that God exists. God is the creator of the heavens and the earth. God is the creator of all living things on earth, plants and animals. God is the creator of everything that sustains life on earth, including the seas and the land, the sun and the heavenly bodies. God is the creator of man.

l.q: What makes man different from the rest of God's creation?
l.a: Man was made in God's image, after His likeness.

l.q: What were God's initial commands to man?
l.a: God commanded man to 'Be fruitful and multiply and fill the earth and subdue it.' He commanded man to be in charge of the fish and the birds and all the living things on earth.

s.h: A thrill of hope the weary soul rejoices

1.a: Enjoy a cup of warm chocolate or apple cider with someone who lives with you.
